 It also uses fonts to indicate words that are not there in the greek but the meaning implies that those words would be there. (words like the, or, of )
 
 It also uses astersiks to mark certain texts.
 
 If you are interested, I would suggest a local christian used book store or just a used book store and get a Ryrie NASB study bible. Not only would you get the NASB stuff but also foot notes that explain customs, weights and measures, some commentary, and some idiomatic items.
